name: BANKSTOWN HELICOPTERS PTY LIMITED
about: Bankstown Helicopters Pty Limited, based at Bankstown Airport in NSW, offers a comprehensive range of aviation services including flight lessons, charter services, and scenic tours. With over 40 years of experience, our Sydney-based training facility boasts one of Australiaâ€™s most diverse helicopter fleets. Our highly experienced instructors and theory teachers guide students from zero experience to fully licensed pilots, offering courses such as CPL, PPL, Low Level (including Mustering and Sling), and NVFR TESTING. We provide convenient services including overnight accommodation, internet access, and on-site tests and examinations. Our commitment to safety and exceptional service has built an impressive reputation. Join us for a thrilling helicopter journey and experience the beauty of Sydney from above.
